title: Mortgage Loan Processor
job_overview:
As a Mortgage Processor will play a vital role in managing loan files from submission to underwriting. You will be responsible for collecting and verifying documentation, maintaining clear communication with clients and internal teams, and ensuring the file meets compliance and lender guidelines. You must be highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of working independently in a fast-paced environment. Key Duties and Responsibilities:
Review and organize borrower documentation such as bank statements, ID, income docs, credit reports, etc.
Ensure completeness and accuracy of the loan file prior to underwriting
Communicate with borrowers, loan officers, and third-party vendors to gather missing documentation
Submit files to lenders and follow up on conditions in a timely manner
Maintain detailed notes in the CRM for each file
Identify red flags or compliance issues and escalate as needed
Stay updated with lender guidelines and loan product changes
Work collaboratively with the processing and sales teams to meet deadlines
Deliver white-glove service to every client by being proactive and solution-oriented
Success in This Role Looks Like:
Fast turnaround on document collection and submission
Clean, organized files with minimal back-and-forth from underwriters
Consistent and professional communication
Ability to handle multiple loan files at once with minimal supervision
Contribution to a positive, accountable team culture

residential, commercial, and non-QM loans specifically.
